pkgmetadata.longdescription: rec===.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/iawia002/rec.svg?branch=master :alt: Build Status :target: https://travis-ci.org/iawia002/reca collection of some useful regular expressions.Hello, world------------Installation.. code-block:: bash pip install recExample.. code-block:: python In [1]: import rec In [2]: rec.domain('http://bangumi.bilibili.com/anime/1089') Out[2]: [u'bilibili.com'] In [3]: rec.domain('http://bangumi.bilibili.com/anime/1089', root=False) Out[3]: ['bilibili']Documentation-------------See `doc.md <https://github.com/iawia002/rec/blob/master/doc.md>`_ðŸŒ™
